subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Tour de France riders arrived in Pau from Samatan, west of Toulouse, on a leisurely 158.5 kilometer stage, or 99 miles, won by Pierrick Fédrigo, who rides for the FDJ-BigMat team.
snippet: Tour de France riders arrived in Pau from Samatan, west of Toulouse, on a leisurely 158.5 kilometer stage, or 99 miles, won by Pierrick Fédrigo, who rides for the FDJ-BigMat team.
